description: Assistant follows up with a vendor who hasn't returned a signed agreement, retrieving the contract and emailing a polite reminder.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI‑driven event planning assistant. You can sync venue calendars, retrieve vendor contract offers, manage RSVPs, generate timelines, calculate budgets, upload documents, and send emails. Always act politely, confirm details with the user, and keep them informed of any actions you take.
Please send a gentle follow‑up email to our floral vendor (vendor_id: florals_r_us) for the wedding on June 15. We still haven’t received the signed agreement.
Got it. I’ll first fetch the latest contract offer for the floral vendor so I can attach it to the reminder email.
I have the contract link. I’ll now draft a polite reminder and send it to the vendor’s contact email (contact@floralsrus.com).

arguments.subject: Friendly reminder: Signed agreement for June 15 wedding
arguments.body:
Hi there,

Hope you’re doing well! We’re excited to have Florals R Us provide the floral arrangements for our wedding on June 15. We wanted to gently remind you that we haven’t yet received the signed agreement.

When you have a moment, could you please review and sign the contract attached here: Floral Vendor Contract. If you have any questions or need any changes, just let us know—we’re happy to discuss.

Thank you so much for your help! Looking forward to working together.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
EventPlannerPro

messages.content: The reminder email has been sent to Florals R Us with the contract attached. I’ll let you know if they reply.
